content:
Propose to build in api118 and api120, just (5) OS to reduce use of credits:

  1. Windows
  2. MacOS Universal
  3. Linux - which one?
  4. Flatpak - 22.04 x86
  5. Debian - which one"

@Sebastien Rosset and @Quinton Hoole Please advise.

I don't yet know enough about why they are being built, to know which ones we can exclude.
I would guess that Windows, MacOS, Flatpak and Debian are probably sufficiently different to catch most inconsistencies.

I would imagine that we should do all the builds periodically (say weekly) but probably not necessary to do them for every commit or every PR.
